maneuver.name: basic_startup
maneuver.description: Basic startup maneuver, necessary for remote start from jury modul. DO NOT CHANGE!

maneuver.name: next_man_stopped
maneuver.description: Get next maneuver from STOPPED position! Car has speed zero.

maneuver.name: next_man_running
maneuver.description: Get next maneuver from RUNNING position! Car has speed != zero, follow-line mode active.

maneuver.name: cross_parking
maneuver.description: Automatically find next free spot for cross parking (if no particular parking spot ID is given).
